title: Winter Warmth for Rangpur
description: Collecting warm clothes for underprivileged families in Rangpur. Help us reach 500 families this season.

title: Blanket Drive Chattogram
description: Join our blanket donation drive to support slum areas in Chattogram with essential winter items.

title: Sylhet Hill Support Campaign
description: Distributing jackets and socks to children in remote hill areas of Sylhet.

title: Dhaka City Coat Collection
description: Urban-based drive focusing on collecting coats for street dwellers in Dhaka during peak winter.
